issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1. install KS onto an ipad 2 running ios5 gm seed (no other ti apps were installed on the device)
2. Launch the application
3. hit the home button

results: nothing occurs consle shows:
Oct  5 13:23:45 unknown UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.titanium[0x774c][160] <Notice>: [DEBUG] fire app event: pause
Oct  5 13:23:45 unknown UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.titanium[0x774c][160] <Notice>: [INFO] app was paused from the foreground

expected: notifications to appear

fwiw, the same app running on ipad2 4.3 works as expected. Believe this worked as expected on B5
fields.summary: iPad 2, iOS5 - no notifications apear when backgrounding KS
fields.environment: 1.7.2, tistud 1.0.4, os10.6.8. Xcode 4.2 gm seed. ipad2 ios 5 gm seed. Not seen running same app on a 4.3 ipad2. Not seen on an ipod touch or iphone running ios5gm seed

comments.body: On Sabils advice I republished the app with a new id and am now getting notifications. I can no longer get into this bad state.
as per Blain attaching the "bad build" (ks) and the good build (ks 1)

Restored the device with the iOS5 gm seed 9a334. Tested the KitchenSink bad app bundle posted above and it works fine. Notifications seem to appear properly and App Badge also seems to be set properly.

Further tested with a new build of KitchenSink with following build details :
Titanium SDK  timestamp=10/06/11 15:51  version=1.7.3  githash=49cd327
iOS  5.0 (9A5288d) with Xcode Version:	4.1 (4D151a).

and problems where found.

Closing issue due to not being able to reproduce

Tested with Ti Studio 1.0.8.201201101928
Provided KS in ticket, and also 1_8_X
OSX Lion
iPad 2 OS 5.0.1
